name: Overgrowth (itch) (MaidAndReady, JM36, Funbam, JadDoggy)
description:
You wake up with no memory of where you are. You only know one thing. You have to get back to your mother tree. Run, jump and solve puzzles in an eerie flash style puzzle platformer as you try to return back to your roots. Spawn children and use them to help solve puzzles. Beware though, Mother doesn't like the fruitless loss of her kids...

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2023: Roots

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - Interact

F - Spawn child

R - Restart

Tab - Change view

Esc - Menu

Credits:

Ryan Ngoon - Programming, Level Design, VA

Funbam (Brendon Mye) - Programming, Level Design

Jad-Doggy (Jadon Ark) - Audio, Level Design

JM36 (Josh Castillo) - Programming, Level Design, UI

Oceana Lee - Character Art

Baykidrizzle - Cutscene, Materials, Sprite Art
